## Rainbow Fog [Dea & Ro]

Fog is rainbow. Use with "Set Enable Fog" code for full effect (crazy). Credits to Dea for Rainbow Function code from MKW, I edited it to write to fog addresses

<details>
<summary>Reveal Code</summary>

```powerpc
C0000000 00000020
9421FFAC BDC10008
3DE08071 8A8F9BDB
8A0F9BDF 8A2F9BE3
3DE08000 8ACF1860
8A6F1864 3AD60001
2C16FFFF 418000A8
2C130000 4082000C
3A8000FF 3A600001
2C130001 40820014
3A100003 2C1000FF
40820008 3A600002
2C130002 40820014
3A94FFFD 2C140000
40820008 3A600003
2C130003 40820014
3A310003 2C1100FF
40820008 3A600004
2C130004 40820014
3A10FFFD 2C100000
40820008 3A600005
2C130005 40820014
3A940003 2C1400FF
40820008 3A600006
2C130006 40820014
3A31FFFD 2C110000
40820008 3A600001
3AC00000 3DE08071
9A8F9BDB 9A0F9BDF
9A2F9BE3 3DE08000
9ACF1860 9A6F1864
B9C10008 38210054
4E800020 00000000
```
</details>
